Desc.entry: A City Council adventure playground administered by Activity Sheffield for children aged 5-14 years. Children aged under 8 years must be accompanied by a parent or suitable adult. The adventure playground has a large outdoor area with many structures which are designed to incorporate an element of risk. They are designed to assist children to develop co-ordination and balance. Also has an indoor area and outdoor games area.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Tues-Fri 3.30-8pm, Sat 12noon-6pm (term-time); Tues-Sat 12noon-6pm (school holidays); closed Sundays and & Mondays
